Greek Yogurt Parfait

A quick and healthy breakfast that's full of protein and fresh fruit.

Preparation time: 5 minutes Cooking time: 0 minutes Total time: 5 minutes Portions: 1 Level of complexity: Easy

Ingredients

1 cup plain Greek yogurt
1/2 cup mixed berries
1/4 cup granola
1 tablespoon honey

Preparation

• In a tall glass, layer the Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola.
• Drizzle honey over the top.
• Serve immediately.
